alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cabarrus, eastern Catawba, Davie, southeastern Alexander, Lincoln, Iredell, Mecklenburg, southeastern Cleveland, Rowan, Gaston, central York and northern Cherokee Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 659 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Statesville to 9 miles east of Lincolnton to 7 miles east of Gaffney. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gastonia, Rock Hill, Uptown Charlotte, Huntersville, Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, Salisbury, Statesville, Shelby and Newton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
